name: Logon
body:
This is a jar for logging into Windows Remote Desktop. It is an important step in many cases of software testing of windows system, you konw what I mean. :)

It is a demo to let you connect any Windows System automatically.(Just wrote code for resultion 1920x1080). 

###How to run:

1. put the logon.properties and logon.jar in the same folder.
1. eidt the logon.properties in which you can edit the information of server where you want to connect.
1. run the logon.jar.(double click or use "java -jar logon.jar" by windows cmd.exe)
1. the program will set your desktop theme to classic and disable font clearType, do not worry it:).
1. the program will control your mouse and keyboard to connect the remote server, do not disturb it!

###If you need the source code, please contact @hugo, email: z_yu_t@163.com or LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/zhangyutao
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
